w :  i expected you ' d come to my birthday party yesterday .
m :  i ' m terribly sorry .  susan .  i had to see off a friend of mine at the airport last night .

question: what did the man do last night ?
choice: he went to visit a friend .
he went to say goodbye to his friend at the airport .
he went to another city with his friend .
answer: he went to say goodbye to his friend at the airport .
